[ library(port_profiler) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

last_port_profile(++Options)

Output another port profile for the most recently profiled goal
Options
A list of OptionName:OptionValue structures

Description

This allows to output (again) the results of the previous call to port_profile/2, possibly in a different format. The options are the same as in port_profile/2. Note that the show_caller option can only be given if it was on in the corresponding call to port_profile/2, otherwise the corresponding information is not available.

See Also

port_profile / 2
